aboutme.title: Who am I?
aboutme.text:
Hello! I'm a passionate full stack developer with a solid background in multiplatform application development and microcomputer systems and networks. Throughout my career, I have gained extensive experience in various languages and technologies, enabling me to design, improve, and troubleshoot a variety of projects. 
 
In the field of web development, I have worked with cutting-edge technologies such as TypeScript in Angular and Node.js with JavaScript, where I have developed both the frontend and backend of complex web applications. I also have experience using ASP.NET and PHP to create robust and scalable web solutions. 
 
Additionally, I have ventured into desktop application development using .NET Framework and C#, providing customized and efficient solutions for various business needs. I have also developed APIs using these same technologies to facilitate integration between different systems. 
 
My experience also includes database management, especially in SQL Server environments, where I have designed and managed efficient and secure databases to support web and desktop applications. 
 
I am constantly seeking exciting challenges and opportunities to expand my skills while contributing to the success of innovative projects. I look forward to collaborating with you on your next project!
aboutme.introExperiencias: I have accumulated valuable experience as a programmer, starting with a multidisciplinary approach that has allowed me not only to master technical skills but also to develop an analytical mindset and an ability to solve problems efficiently.

angular.name: TypeScript
experiences: I created a web ERP from scratch using Angular and reactive programming.
I made calls to a .NET API, read NFC cards, and dynamically created PDFs from XML data.
I implemented facial recognition in photos, various encryption techniques, and used local and session storage.

node.name: Javascript
experiences: I developed middleware in Express to control connected operators on a website, hosted in IIS.
It acted as a bridge for direct orders from the server to operators with an active session.
It disabled the website if any of the servers were inactive and notified the operators for efficient fault localization.
It loaded translations of labels and messages from Access files in multiple languages.

java.name: Java
experiences: I learned the basics of programming with Java, including connections to MySQL and SQLServer, but I have no work experience in this language.

csharp.name: C#
experiences: I participate in a main project of a desktop ERP, where I worked on sending mass emails, facial recognition in photos, and performance improvements.
I developed a RestAPI from scratch in .NET and participated in code updates of an internal web page in ASP.NET.

javaandroid.name: Java (Android Studio)
experiences: I developed applications with interaction with API, biometric recognition, NFC, QR scanning, network configuration, photo encryption, and performance optimizations.

sqlserver.name: SQL Server
experiences: I perform regular maintenance and updates on SQL Server to ensure its proper operation and security.
I learned to work with SQL Server during my programming studies and have since used it as the main database in all the applications I work on.

mysql.name: MySQL
experiences: I maintained and queried PHP for MySQL management from UI, as well as the use of procedures, triggers, CRUD, and connection with other languages.

mongodb.name: MongoDB
experiences: I learned the basics of MongoDB and used it from the terminal, but I have no work experience in this area.

php.name: PHP
experiences: I migrated a website from PHP 5.3 to PHP 8.1 and made corresponding updates.
I worked on maintenance and queries in PHP for MySQL management from UI.

htmlcss.name: HTML & CSS
experiences: I developed projects in HTML/5, CSS/3, and SCSS, with animations, transformations, and transitions.

Improvements in existing applications, PHP migration, and website fixes.
